alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Lee; Travis; Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 21 at 7:20PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Williamson, southeastern Travis, northwestern Bastrop and northwestern Lee Counties through 800 PM CDT... At 720 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wyldwood, or 9 miles east of Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Taylor, Elgin, Manor, Cedar Creek, Coupland, Wyldwood, Camp Swift, Hornsby Bend, Webberville, Knobb Springs, Garfield, Blue, Beyarsville, McDade, Cedar Hills, Noack and Butler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Texas.
